regular-body:
In my case, this means deleting all audio editions of the Economist that I either didn’t listen to or didn’t think appropriately awesome from 2010. 9.6G of MP3 files – more space than my computer has had free in years – sits quietly in my Trash. 3, 2, 1 …

… and done. 14.57 GB free. I … I guess I might get to play Civilization over the weekend after all?
